spatial_accuracy.notes: Significant spatial drift and mirroring. The garage area (bottom right) has been hallucinated into a living/bedroom space. Door and window placement lacks correspondence with the architectural plan, particularly in the living room and kitchen transition.

structural_fidelity.notes: The 2-car garage is fundamentally missing, replaced by habitable rooms. The central hallway structure is overly complex and does not match the 2D layout. Wall thicknesses vary inconsistently across the render.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is used to fill hallucinated spaces. Kitchen island shape roughly follows the plan, but scale is distorted. Bedroom logic contradicts the original specified room types.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good lighting and texture work. The isometric perspective is consistent, though some geometry clipping occurs at the corners.

detected_errors.description: Missing 2-car garage unit; replaced with living space.
Hallucinated exterior windows on the left side of the study/dining area.
Misplaced bathroom fixtures; the central bath layout is flipped compared to the 2D plan.
Proportion distortion in the Master Bedroom and Master Bath transition.
Orientation error: Several doors swing in directions that obstruct the narrow hallways created in the render.
